tagline.en: Making decentralization universally accessible and useful through the world’s most powerful infrastructure and community engagement.
tagline.zh: 通过技术与社区，让去中心化触手可及。

introduce.en: Providing world class Silicon Valley talent to oversee, govern and maximize growth to the EOS ecosystem, we act as a leading block producer, staying ahead of the curve and providing infrastructure that scales. We are top engineers and visionaries from silicon valley community, and we have resources and willingnesses to promote EOS ecosystem to next level for digital world. With our expertise and experience, we stick to the goods to make EOS community better.
introduce.zh: EOS硅谷植根于美国硅谷地区，汇聚了硅谷各大顶尖公司的技术和产品精英。团队专注于科技，深耕于技术，核心成员主要来自于硅谷顶级公司。团队拥有最前沿的信息与技术实力，最丰富的生态建设经验与行业资源，最国际化的背景与顶尖人才。
